name: Pala_Din
description:
Once upon a time, there was a very happy shepherd. He milked his cows in the mornings, fed his animals, and made a living by looking after them. All the animals were loyal and trusting of him. This shepherd's name was Pala. But one day, thieves thought that the animals of the Pala were magical and they left Pala alone by stealing them. It takes a hero to save those loyal friends and you must be that hero yes you, come on don't stop helping Pala to save his loyal friends
